name: Mouse Adventures
description:
-----------------------Mouse Adventures v3 by souvlaki42--------------------------------                              https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/306088279

------------------------------------------Instructions------------------------------------------

Press space to start
Press w,a,s,d to move
Avoid the cat
If the cat catch you, press space to set Power to 30 before time runs out else you will lose
If you lose press the up arrow to restart
Make the highest score

-----------------------------------------Version Map-------------------------------------------

Until now:
v1 = basic mechanics
v2 = cat added, better graphics
v3 = power, timer added, high score, better controls, sounds, end screen added
In the future:
v4 = music, more sounds, end animation
v5 = skins on the mouse, super points, achievements
